title: PPC graph - opportunity cost - grain and steel

content.question: Before specialization and trade, the domestic opportunity cost of producing 1 ton of grain in Alpha and in Beta is which of the following?

choices.label: Alpha Beta 1 ton of steel 1 ton of steel
Alpha Beta 1 ton of steel 2 tons of steel
Alpha Beta 2 tons of steel 1 ton of steel
Alpha Beta 1 ton of steel 0.5 ton of steel
Alpha Beta 0.33 ton of steel 1.5 tons of steel

content.answer: Alpha Beta 1 ton of steel 2 tons of steel

topic.text: 1.2: Opportunity Cost and the Production Possibilities Curve (PPC)
